name: E. Game of the Year
statement:
Monocarp and Polycarp are playing a computer game. This game features n
bosses for the playing to kill, numbered from 1 to n.They will fight
boss the following way: Monocarp makes k attempts to kill the boss;
Polycarp makes k attempts to kill the boss; Monocarp makes k attempts to
kill the boss; Polycarp makes k attempts to kill the boss; ... Monocarp
kills the i-th boss on a_i-th attempt. Polycarp kills the i-th boss on
b_i-th attempt. After one of them kills the i-th boss, they move on to
the (i+1)-st boss. The attempt counters reset for both of them. Once one
of them kills the n-th boss, the game ends.Find all values of k from 1
to n such that Monocarp kills .
